subject: newbee: junit 4.1 tests fail
msgSnippet: Hi, I am a complete newbee to junit (and my java is rusted, as well): I downloaded junit 4.1 and ran the test, but they fail (see below). Do I have to be
messageBody:
Hi,

I am a complete newbee to junit (and my java is rusted, as well): I
downloaded junit 4.1 and ran the test, but they fail (see below). Do I
have to be worried? What am I doing wrong? I Tried on Mac OS X and Linux.

Patrick
--------------------------------------------------

java version "1.5.0_06"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.5.0_06-112)
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.5.0_06-64, mixed mode, sharing)

--------------------------------------------------
CLASSPATH is:
:/Users/pg/java/junit4.1/junit-4.1.jar

--------------------------------------------------

~/java/junit4.1$ java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore org.junit.tests.AllTests
JUnit version 4.1
...............................................I........................................................................................................................................................................................I.............................E.
